column4: i have edited the mount point of my ipod, and it doesn't mount anymore, how do i undo my mistake?
pici: from the driver tab of properties i think
i've changed the mountpoint from nothing ("") to /ipod
are they failing on all networks? or just here?
yes. 6 month release cycle, so yea.
yeah, but from august to october there are.. 2 months?
uhhh. there's not one being released in august ^_^
ubuntu's naming convention ... x.y, where x is year, and y is month.  hardy, 8.04, will be released this month at some point
but i thought it was delayed
is it? hm. it might be, i havent been following. those in #ubuntu+1 might be able to provide more info
